scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:ui
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:ui && npm run test:system
scripts.test:system: cd ai-knowledge-system && pnpm exec playwright test || true
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:ui -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ui
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:ui
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:ui && npm run setup:system
